attributes.action: do the honourable thing, dissolve parliament and hold a general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a discredited parliament with no public support, I call on the Prime Minister to take the lead on a problem and dissolve parliament to allow the voting public their right to elect honourable members of parliament.  Not the current group of self serving career politicians we currently have.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
